title: Trump admin's energy agenda hailed for crucial 'wins' as green activists lash out
description: Conservative energy groups are celebrating a slate of Trump-era deregulation wins, while environmental activists argue the moves enrich industry giants and raise costs for American families.
content: FIRST ON FOX: A coalition of conservative groups representing the energy industry is hailing a list of ten regulatory and fiscal "wins" under the Trump administration's new Energy Secretary, Chris Wr… [+6344 chars]
